Views¶

Texcavator¶

texcavator.views.index(request)¶

Render main page.

Query¶

query.views.add_stopword(*args, **kwargs)¶

Add a stopword to the stopword list.

query.views.create_query(*args, **kwargs)¶

Create a new query.

query.views.delete(*args, **kwargs)¶

Delete a query.

query.views.delete_stopword(*args, **kwargs)¶

Delete a stopword from the stopword list.

query.views.download_data(*args, **kwargs)¶

This request occurs when the user clicks the download link that we emailed

query.views.download_prepare(*args, **kwargs)¶

Request from BiLand to create the ocr+meta-data zipfile for download

query.views.index(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Return a list of queries for a given user.

query.views.query(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Return a query.

query.views.stopwords(*args, **kwargs)¶

Return the stopword list for a user and query.

query.views.timeline(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Generate a timeline for a query.

query.views.update(*args, **kwargs)¶

Update a query.

Services¶

Views for the services app

services.views.cancel_by_task_id(request, task_id)¶

Cancel Celery task.

services.views.check_status_by_task_id(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Returns the status of the generate_tv_cloud task

If the task is finished, the results of the task are returned.

services.views.cloud(*args, **kwargs)¶

Return word cloud data using the terms aggregation approach

This view is currently not used, because it uses the terms aggregation approach to generate word clouds, and this is not feasible in ES.

Returns word cloud data for a single document word cloud (based on a single document id) and multiple document word clouds (either based on a list of document ids (i.e., timeline burst cloud) or a query with metadata).

services.views.doc_count(*args, **kwargs)¶

Return the number of documents returned by a query

services.views.download_scan_image(request)¶

download scan image file

services.views.export_cloud(*args, **kwargs)¶

Export cloud data to cvs file

services.views.proxy(*args, **kwargs)¶

Proxy a request and return the result

This view takes over the role of the url mappings and must therefore be removed as soon as possible.

services.views.retrieve_document(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Retrieve a document from the ES index

services.views.search(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

Perform search request and return html string with results

services.views.tv_cloud(*args, **kwargs)¶

Generate termvector word cloud using the termvector approach.

Returns word cloud data for a single document word cloud (based on a single document id) and multiple document word clouds (either based on a list of document ids (i.e., timeline burst cloud) or a query with metadata).

For multiple document word clouds, a celery task generates the cloud data.
